animals.name: Salmon
animals.description: The salmon is a species of fish native to freshwater and saltwater habitats. It is known for its distinctive pink flesh and ability to swim upstream to spawn.

animals.name: Elephant
animals.description: The elephant is the largest land animal. It is known for its trunk, tusks, and large ears.

animals.name: Tiger
animals.description: The tiger is a powerful carnivore and is the largest cat species. It has distinctive orange fur with black stripes.

animals.name: Giraffe
animals.description: The giraffe is the tallest living terrestrial animal. It has a long neck, spotted coat, and distinctive horns.

animals.name: Zebra
animals.description: The zebra is a wild horse species known for its black and white stripes.

animals.name: Penguin
animals.description: The penguin is a flightless bird that is mostly found in the Southern Hemisphere. It is known for its black and white coloration.

animals.name: Kangaroo
animals.description: The kangaroo is a marsupial found in Australia. It is known for its powerful hind legs and pouch for carrying young.

animals.name: Gorilla
animals.description: The gorilla is the largest primate and is native to Africa. It is known for its strength and intelligence.

animals.name: Hippo
animals.description: The hippopotamus is a large, mostly herbivorous mammal found in sub-Saharan Africa. It is known for its large size and aggressive behavior.

animals.name: Panda
animals.description: The giant panda is a bear native to south central China. It is known for its distinctive black and white coat and its diet of bamboo.

animals.name: Dolphin
animals.description: The dolphin is a highly intelligent marine mammal known for its playful behavior and communication abilities.

animals.name: Polar Bear
animals.description: The polar bear is a large bear native to the Arctic. It is adapted to living in cold environments and is a powerful predator.

animals.name: Koala
animals.description: The koala is a marsupial found in Australia. It is known for its diet of eucalyptus leaves and its sleepy demeanor.

animals.name: Crocodile
animals.description: The crocodile is a large reptile found in tropical regions. It is known for its powerful jaws and ability to ambush prey.

animals.name: Rabbit
animals.description: The rabbit is a small mammal known for its long ears, hopping gait, and ability to reproduce quickly.

animals.name: Sloth
animals.description: The sloth is a slow-moving mammal found in the forests of Central and South America. It is known for its relaxed lifestyle and slow metabolism.

animals.name: Ostrich
animals.description: The ostrich is the largest bird in the world and is native to Africa. It is known for its long neck and fast running speed.

animals.name: Pangolin
animals.description: The pangolin is a mammal covered in scales found in Asia and Africa. It is known for its unique appearance and its status as the most trafficked mammal in the world.

animals.name: Cheetah
animals.description: The cheetah is the fastest land animal and is native to Africa and parts of Iran. It is known for its slender build and distinctive black spots.

animals.name: Llama
animals.description: The llama is a domesticated South American camelid known for its woolly coat and use as a pack animal.
